H0.text: Cardiac muscle is the kind of muscle that the heart is mainly composed of.

H1.text: Respiratory muscle is the kind of muscle that the heart is mainly composed of.

H2.text: Idealized muscle is the kind of muscle that the heart is mainly composed of.

H3.text: Nerve muscle is the type of muscle that the heart is mainly composed of.

A4.text: Cardiac muscle (myocardium) forms a thick middle layer between the outer layer of the heart wall (the pericardium) and the inner layer (the endocardium)

A5.text: Cardiac muscle (myocardium) forms the bulk of the heart
